name: It's Getting Hot In Here
description:
You are a boi made of water trying to escape a volcano. Keep picking up water bottles to stay alive, use the mouse to shoot at enemies, and don't touch any lava ;)

Tips:

- s drops you faster 

-holding space makes you jump higher 

-taping space makes you do a smaller jump

-4 power ups(double jump, jetpack[holdjump], sheild[cant take damage from enemies], infinite water[spray and pray])
